mapper.select: SELECT fw.fwFollower ,fw.fwFollow ,mm.mmSeq ,mm.mmNickname ,upm.upmUuidName as upUuidName ,upm.upmPath as upPath FROM follow fw JOIN member mm ON fw.fwFollower = mm.mmSeq LEFT JOIN uploadMemberProfile upm ON mm.mmSeq = upm.upmMemberSeq AND upm.upmDefaultNy = 1 WHERE fw.fwFollow = #{fwFollow}
